attributes.action: Prioritise a green transformation in the COVID-19 economic recovery plan
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government to step up their commitment to people and our environment.

The evidence is clear: implementing green policies is the best way to revive the economy and tackle climate change.

With all of our futures thrown into question by the pandemic, now is the best time to re-prioritise and build back better.

We’ve consolidated expert research on the most impactful measures to achieve a sustainable and thriving economy. 

Visit: Peoplesplan.org
attributes.background:
People want an urgent response to the climate emergency. We have now seen that rapid action in times of crisis is possible. 

Let’s use the COVID-19 pandemic as a turning point in climate action, combining economic recovery with sustainable climate policy. 

The time for action is now.

rejection.details:

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
